plot: No one says your perfect mate ... has to be a primate. A quirky, social commentary about a man who wants to marry a cat, but has trouble getting his parents blessing. Awkwardly lighthearted...
title: The Man Who Loved His Cat
plot_es: No one says your perfect mate ... has to be a primate. A quirky, social commentary about a man who wants to marry a cat, but has trouble getting his parents blessing. Awkwardly lighthearted...
original_name: The Man Who Loved His Cat
